item.name: Acorn
item.description: A natural food, ingredient, bait or seed.

item.name: Bread
item.description: A baked food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Fungus
item.description: A peculiar food, ingredient or remedy against poison.

item.name: Cheese
item.description: A yummy food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Piou Legs
item.description: A tender food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Lettuce Leaf
item.description: A healthy food, ingredient or bait.

item.name: Piberries
item.description: The famous staining fruit.

item.name: Sea Drops
item.description: Yucky drops of salt water.

item.name: Aquada
item.description: A nutritious fruit of the sea.

item.name: Pink Blobime
item.description: Yucky pink mucus of little blub.

item.name: Purple Blobime
item.description: Stinky purple mucus of blub.

item.name: Half Croconut
item.description: Its inside seems delicious.

item.name: Croconut
item.description: Fallen from a crocotree, this fruit could be opened.

item.name: Old Book
item.description: A book that threatens to fall apart in your hands as you carefully browse the pages.

item.name: Plushroom
item.description: A strange remedy of many possible uses.

item.name: Pumpkin Seeds
item.description: Yucky seeds that threaten to grow out-of-control.

item.name: Delicious Cookie
item.description: This is a reward from the Cookie Master. Be careful before you eat it, its effects are unknown...

item.name: Urchin Meat
item.description: A seafood ingredient.

item.name: Easter Egg
item.description: A chocolate shell covered in a very thin metal layer.

item.name: Piberries Infusion
item.description: A potion made from piberries.

item.name: Fate's Potion
item.description: An effective blood-loss remedy.

item.name: Clotho Liquor
item.description: Remedy used in feral warrior training sessions.

item.name: Lachesis Brew
item.description: Rare, powerful and restricted remedy.

item.name: Atropos Mixture
item.description: The most advanced potion ever synthesized.

item.name: Elixir Of Life
item.description: A potion able to restore even dead trees to life.

item.name: Iron Shovel
item.description: Discover treasures, dungeons and raw materials.

item.name: Pumpkin Juice
item.description: Blood-colored juice from madly swarming pumpkin.

item.name: Manana
item.description: A fast healing fruit.

item.name: Curshroom
item.description: A strange remedy of many possible uses, cures poison.

item.name: Carrot
item.description: Good in various recipes.

item.name: Red Plush Wine
item.description: Wine produced from black grapes in the south-east of Aurora.

item.name: Piou and The Fluffy
item.description: This story is a warning against listening to flattery.

item.name: Poem about Poems
item.description: A heart touching poem written by Nard.

item.name: Chorus of the Woods
item.description: This poem was written centuries ago and is from the ancient city of Keshlam.

item.name: Communication Theory
item.description: Various meta explanations regarding the dialogue system.

item.name: Fluffy Animals who Love Their Owners
item.description: A quick guide to introduce pet caring.

item.name: The Book of Laws
item.description: The basic laws respected and upheld in all parts of Gasaron.

item.name: Fishing Guide Vol. I
item.description: A small book that covers the basics of fishing.

item.name: Recipe Book
item.description: A small book with all the culinary wonders you have collected.

item.name: Master Book
item.description: The book which knows all mana secrets, reserved only for masters.

item.name: Carp Sandwich
item.description: A yummy sandwich, made with a fresh carp.

item.name: Piouleg Sandwich
item.description: A typical Artis food. How can you just eat these little Pious?

item.name: Manana Sandwich
item.description: A veggie sandwich, for those who like it.

item.name: Beer
item.description: Just a beer, nothing else. Don`t drink and drive!

item.name: Roasted Maggot
item.description: a maggot, roasted on fire. Mmh, crunchy!

item.name: Bottle of Water
item.description: Fresh springwater from Hurnscald area. Healthy!

item.name: Cherry Cake
item.description: If you like sweets, you will love this homemade cherry cake.

item.name: Maggot Slime Potion
item.description: Eek, it is a slimy potion! Seems suspcious!

item.name: Small Healing Potion
item.description: A small Healing Potion for little wounds.

item.name: Medium Healing Potion
item.description: A medium Healing Potion for painful wounds. Slightly addictive, handle with care.

item.name: Large Healing Potion
item.description: A large Healing Potion. To countermand involuntary amputations.

item.name: Small Mana Potion
item.description: A small Mana Potion for 'Not-at-all-a-Mage' players.

item.name: Medium Mana Potion
item.description: A medium Mana Potion for the Sorcerer's Apprentice.

item.name: Large Mana Potion
item.description: A large Mana Potion for the magic Ones..

item.name: Concentration Potion
item.description: A Potion to make you faster, and to make your attacks hit with higher accuracy.

item.name: Iron Potion
item.description: This potion contains powderized Iron. It makes you strong and resistant against physical attacks.

item.name: Fertility Potion
item.description: A bottle containing some fertilizer, used for making soil fruitful again.
item.effect: Better dont drink it, it could be toxic.

item.name: Honey
item.description: A glass full of the finest honey. Enjoy it, and don't forget to thank the bees!

item.name: Death Potion
item.description: Used for really powerful magic. You should not drink this!

item.name: Grass Seeds
item.description: Common seeds to plant clovers, as food for your Mouboos or for usual clover purposes.

item.name: Flower Seeds
item.description: If you like colorful places.. they need fertile soil so be careful where you plant them.

item.name: Purification Potion
item.description: A bottle containing a magical potion, to clean soil from evil sway.

item.name: Sailor's Stew
item.description: A bowl containing a fine dish for sailors, makes you strong and sturdy.
item.effect: Max. HP +20%, Healing 2000 HP, HIT +5, VIT +3, AGI -3. Effect lasts for 3 minutes.

item.name: Treasure Map
item.description: Points to a location where a valuable treasure may be bured. Perhaps you should try to find the place and dig there.

item.name: Chocolate Bar
item.description: Sweet, sweet chocolate. Do not forget to brush your teeth after eating.

item.name: Mouboo Milk
item.description: Healthy milk.

item.name: Mouboo Steak
item.description: A huge steak from a Mouboo. Are you fine with killing animals to eat them?

item.name: Roasted Acorn
item.description: A great snack, especially in wintertime.

item.name: Red Apple
item.description: A non-poisoned, shiny red apple. Healthy, and yummy!

item.name: A Friend's Gift
item.description: A gift from a friend, just for you! What might be inside?

item.name: Squirrel Stew
item.description: A bowl containing a fine dish made from cute Squirrels, very healthy. Also it makes you strong and sturdy.
item.effect: Max. HP +25%, Healing 2500 HP, VIT +5, AGI +3, DEX -3. Effect lasts for 4 minutes.

item.name: Mouboo Stew
item.description: Its easy. Hunt a Mouboo, slaughter it, make a great healthy dish out of it.
item.effect: Max. HP +30%, Healing 3000 HP, VIT +5, DEX +3, AGI -3. Effect lasts for 5 minutes.

item.name: Squirrel Meat
item.description: Edible parts of slaughtered Squirrels. Are you sure Squirrels are not way too cute to eat them?

item.name: Seafood Plate
item.description: Nicely arranged plate with some seafood ingredients. Yummy?
item.effect: Max. HP -5%, Healing 3000 HP, VIT +5, DEX +3, AGI -3. Effect lasts for 5 minutes.

item.name: Barbecue Plate
item.description: The best way to prepare good meat is to make barbecue on an open fire.
item.effect: Max. HP +30%, Healing 3000 HP, VIT +5, DEX +3, AGI -3. Effect lasts for 5 minutes.

item.name: Veggie Plate
item.description: Killing animals is unethical? Well, after all it is not needed for human nutrition. Yummy!
item.effect: Max. HP +30%, Healing 3000 HP, VIT +5, DEX +3, AGI -3. Effect lasts for 5 minutes.

item.name: Blueberries
item.description: Tasty, healty little blue berries. Harvest in summer. Do not mix it up with deadly nightshades!

item.name: Donut
item.description: Sweet chocolate donut. Do not eat too much, especially if you do not have your toothbrush with you.
item.effect: Healing 2250 HP, LUK +5, VIT +3. Effect lasts for 60 seconds.

item.name: Blueberry Cake
item.description: Sweet cake made with blueberries. Comes with some cream.
item.effect: Healing 2000 HP, LUK +5, VIT +3. Effect lasts for 90 seconds.

item.name: Carrot Cake
item.description: Healthy, tasty carrot cake. Are you a rabbit, or what?
item.effect: Healing 2700 HP, INT +5, DEX +3. Effect lasts for 120 seconds.

item.name: Small Tentacles
item.description: Colorful tentacles with poisonous barbs.

item.name: Piou Feathers
item.description: Small feathers of an innocent little piou.

item.name: Tortuga Shell Fragment
item.description: Used to make tools and decorations.

item.name: Half Eggshell
item.description: Maybe something hatched, or someone was cooked...

item.name: Ratto Tail
item.description: Hairless tail of a ratto.

item.name: Ratto Teeth
item.description: Sharp incisors of a ratto.

item.name: Croc Claw
item.description: It moves and pinches without its body.

item.name: Squichy Claws
item.description: Claws from a wild Squichy.

item.name: Tortuga Shell
item.description: A symbol of shelter.

item.name: Tortuga Tongue
item.description: Adept to digesting blubs.

item.name: Pearl
item.description: A beautiful round and shiny pearl.

item.name: Coral
item.description: Can indicate the health of oceanic ecosystems.

item.name: Blue Coral
item.description: A coral dyed in blue by a blub.

item.name: Fish Box
item.description: A wooden box full of fresh fish that Couwan gave you.

item.name: Guild Certification
item.description: This piece of paper grants you official permission to found a guild.

item.name: Croconut Box
item.description: Contains 17 croconuts.

item.name: Plushroom Box
item.description: Contains 87 plushrooms.

item.name: Poisoned Dish
item.description: A special dish made of strange ingredients.

item.name: La Johanne's Key
item.description: An iron key to open La Johanne's entrance door.

item.name: Left Crafty Wing
item.description: This wing is slight and soft unlike its former owner.

item.name: Bat Teeth
item.description: What sharp teeth! They seem to be more dangerous than a knife.

item.name: Right Crafty Wing
item.description: This wing is slight and soft unlike its former owner.

item.name: Pumpkin
item.description: An invasive species, sometimes carved during festivals.

item.name: Mushroom Spores
item.description: Some colored spores that help mushrooms spread across the land.

item.name: Moss
item.description: Grows in moist, shady areas.

item.name: Tentacles
item.description: Boneless appendage of an invertebrate.

item.name: Common Carp
item.description: Freshwater is commonly inhabited by these pests.

item.name: Grass Carp
item.description: A smart fish, very difficult to catch.

item.name: Fishing Rod
item.description: Designed for sports fishing.

item.name: Fluffy Fur
item.description: This soft fur is used to make warm clothing.

item.name: Aquada Box
item.description: Contains 50 aquadas.

item.name: Empty Bottle
item.description: An empty bottle, clean and ready to be filled.

item.name: Raw Log
item.description: A somehow strange piece of wood.

item.name: Pink Antennae
item.description: An Antennae, as Pinkies wear it on their heads.

item.name: Empty Mug
item.description: This Tea Mug is pretty empty.

item.name: Pink Petal
item.description: A fragile Petal with an aromatic smell.

item.name: Pile of Ash
item.description: A handfull of Ash with unknown origin.

item.name: Alizarin Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Cobalt Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Gamboge Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Mauve Herb
item.description: A few leaves.

item.name: Gold Nuggets
item.description: A few valuable pieces of gold.

item.name: Coal
item.description: Coal. Black and dirty.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.description: Iron Ore. Hard and heavy.

item.name: Maggot Slime
item.description: Slimy maggot slime.

item.name: Bug Leg
item.description: You busted a gut for getting this, right?

item.name: Hard Spike
item.description: Spiky Spine from a strange mushroom.

item.name: Silk Cocoon
item.description: Very thin and soft.

item.name: Red Rose
item.description: A beautiful red rose. Be careful, it has thorns!

item.name: White Rose
item.description: A beautiful white rose. Be careful, it has thorns!

item.name: Yellow Rose
item.description: A beautiful yellow rose. Be careful, it has thorns!

item.name: Blue Rose
item.description: A blue rose. You haven't seen blue roses before. Where might they grow?

item.name: Red Tulip
item.description: A nice red tulip. It smells nice.

item.name: White Tulip
item.description: A beautiful white tulip. Whom could you present it?

item.name: Yellow Tulip
item.description: A yellow tulip. I seems to be not really fresh.

item.name: Blue Tulip
item.description: A shiny blue tulip. There must be a creative grower of flowers somewhere around.

item.name: Coin Bag
item.description: A bag full of coins. They were most probably stolen from someone.

item.name: Magic Feather
item.description: A very rare feather, full of mana power. You may use it to take notes used for wizard purposes, for example.

item.name: Small Mushroom
item.description: A small mushroom. You do not know if it is edible, though.

item.name: Black Scorpion Stinger
item.description: The stinger from a Black Scorpion.

item.name: Golden Scorpion Stinger
item.description: The stinger from the legendary Golden Scorpion.

item.name: Gearwheel
item.description: A small ring with teeth all around. Could be part of some mechanical installation.

item.name: Lockpicks
item.description: Small metal sticks, mostly used to open locks illegally. Don't be caught with this!

item.name: Bone
item.description: Bone from a viro thigh. Scary.

item.name: Druid Tree Branch
item.description: A branch from the mysterious Druid Tree.

item.name: Left Scorpion Claw
item.description: A left claw from a scorpion.

item.name: Right Scorpion Claw
item.description: A right claw from a scorpion.

item.name: Copper Ore
item.description: Copper Ore. Cannot be used in this brute form, so it should be purified.

item.name: Silver Ore
item.description: Silver Ore. Cannot be used in this brute form, so it should be purified.

item.name: Gold Ore
item.description: Gold Ore. Cannot be used in this brute form, so it should be purified.

item.name: Platinum Ore
item.description: Platinum Ore. Cannot be used in this brute form, so it should be purified.

item.name: Diamond Powder
item.description: A powderized Diamond. Has a magic aura, maybe it is useful for something?

item.name: Ruby Powder
item.description: A powderized Ruby. Has a magic aura, maybe it is useful for something?

item.name: Emerald Powder
item.description: A powderized Emerald. Has a magic aura, maybe it is useful for something?

item.name: Sapphire Powder
item.description: A powderized Sapphire. Has a magic aura, maybe it is useful for something?

item.name: Topaz Powder
item.description: A powderized Topaz. Has a magic aura, maybe it is useful for something?

item.name: Amethyst Powder
item.description: A powderized Amethyst. Has a magic aura, maybe it is useful for something?

item.name: Scorpion Stinger
item.description: Stinger from a common Scorpion.

item.name: Skull
item.description: Human Skull. Why are you carrying around this?!?

item.name: Snake Skin
item.description: Skin from a snake. Can be used to make clothes, or other stuff.

item.name: Snake Tongue
item.description: Tongue from a snake. Its forked.

item.name: Terranite Ore
item.description: Terranite Ore. Rare mineral, has a natural repugnancy with Mana.

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.description: A heavy bloc of purified iron, can be used by blacksmiths.

item.name: Copper Ingot
item.description: A heavy bloc of purified copper, can be used by blacksmiths.

item.name: Silver Ingot
item.description: A heavy bloc of purified silver, can be used by silversmiths.

item.name: Gold Ingot
item.description: A heavy, valuable bloc of purified gold, can be used by goldsmiths.

item.name: Platinum Ingot
item.description: A heavy, valuable bloc of purified platinum, can be used by platinumsmiths.

item.name: Terranite Ingot
item.description: A heavy bloc of purified terranite. You wonder who could deal with that mysterious material.

item.name: Rotonium Ore
item.description: Rotonium Ore. Cannot be used in this brute form, so it must be purified.

item.name: Zealite Ore
item.description: Zealite Ore. One of the rarest ores in the world. Hard to process, you should find a specialized smith for this.

item.name: Rotonium Ingot
item.description: A valuable bloc of purified Rotonium. Light material, useful for special weapons and tactics.

item.name: Zealite Ingot
item.description: A heavy, very valuable bloc of purified Zealite. It has a manaic aura.

item.name: Diamond Shard
item.description: A small diamond shard.

item.name: Ruby Shard
item.description: A small ruby shard.

item.name: Emerald Shard
item.description: A small emerald shard.

item.name: Sapphire Shard
item.description: A small sapphire shard.

item.name: Topaz Shard
item.description: A small topaz shard.

item.name: Amethyst Shard
item.description: A small amethyst shard.

item.name: Empty Bowl
item.description: An empty bowl. You may fill it with fine food, in case you get hungry.

item.name: Clothes Pack
item.description: Torn and destroyed by the sea, it still emits a strange aura. Perhaps, one day, it could be restored?

item.name: Treasure Key
item.description: A small, golden Key. Which chest would it fit in?

item.name: Cotton Cloth
item.description: A patch made of cotton. Mainly used for tailoring.

item.name: Leather Patch
item.description: A patch made of leather. Can be used for tailoring, or smithery.

item.name: Snake Scales
item.description: Scales from a snake. You may need to find a specialized smith to take advantage of their lightweight and durability.

item.name: Squirrel Pelt
item.description: Pelt from a cute squirrel. Who killed that poor animal, anyways.

item.name: Wolvern Pelt
item.description: Pelt from a wolvern. Must have been an experienced hunter, eh.

item.name: Empty Plate
item.description: An empty plate. Look for an experienced chef to prepare a nice meal on this!

item.name: Wax Chunk
item.description: A chunk beeswax. It is burning pretty fine.

item.name: Codfish
item.description: A seafish, large and saturating.

item.name: Tuna
item.description: Tasty seafish, can grow incredibly large. Hard to catch - if you are not a school of dolphins.

item.name: Trout
item.description: A very tasty fish. Not simple to prepare properly, though.

item.name: Salmon
item.description: Fascinating fish, easy to catch (if you are a bear).

item.name: Acorn Flour
item.description: Yes, you will need the finest flour only for your baker attempts.

item.name: Leather Suitcase
item.description: Ugh, how can it be so heavy?!

item.name: %Color% Necklace (Copper)
item.description: A %color% necklace, made of copper.

item.name: %Color% Necklace (Silver)
item.description: A %color% necklace, made of silver.

item.name: %Color% Necklace (Gold)
item.description: A %color% necklace, made of gold.

item.name: %Color% Necklace (Platinum)
item.description: A %color% necklace, made of pure platinum.

item.name: Copper Four-Leaf Necklace
item.description: A copper necklace, in the shape of a four-leaf clover. If it makes you lucky?

item.name: Silver Four-Leaf Necklace
item.description: A silver necklace, in the shape of a four-leaf clover. If it makes you lucky?

item.name: Golden Four-Leaf Necklace
item.description: A golden necklace, in the shape of a four-leaf clover. If it makes you lucky?

item.name: Platinum Four-Leaf Necklace
item.description: A platinum necklace, in the shape of a four-leaf clover. If it makes you lucky?

item.name: Tooth Necklace
item.description: A necklace with a wolvern tooth on it.

item.name: Teeth Necklace
item.description: A necklace with three wolvern teeth on it. Chapeau!

item.name: Teeth Necklace
item.description: A necklace with five wolvern teeth on it. Hunting mastery!

item.name: Heart Necklace
item.description: A shiny, golden heart necklace, for your beloved ones.

item.name: Mouboo Necklace
item.description: You like Mouboos? You need this!

item.name: Skull Necklace
item.description: A necklace holding the model of a human skull. It has a weird aura.

item.name: Copper Ring
item.description: A simple ring, made of copper.

item.name: Silver Ring
item.description: A simple ring, made of silver.

item.name: Golden Ring
item.description: A simple ring, made of gold.

item.name: Platinum Ring
item.description: A simple ring, made of platinum.

item.name: Soul Ring
item.description: A very special ring, made of zealite. It can connect two souls.

item.name: %Color% Ring (Copper)
item.description: A %color% ring, made of copper.

item.name: %Color% Ring (Silver)
item.description: A %color% ring, made of silver.

item.name: %Color% Ring (Gold)
item.description: A %color% ring, made of gold.

item.name: %Color% Ring (Platinum)
item.description: A %color% ring, made of platinum.

item.name: %Color% Signet Ring (Copper)
item.description: A %color% signet ring, made of copper.

item.name: %Color% Signet Ring (Silver)
item.description: A %color% signet ring, made of silver.

item.name: %Color% Signet Ring (Gold)
item.description: A %color% signet ring, made of gold.

item.name: %Color% Signet Ring (Platinum)
item.description: A %color% signet ring, made of platinum.

item.name: Ancient Scroll
item.description: A scroll, with writings in a long forgotten language. It may be mananese, but you are not sure at all.

item.name: Four-Leaf Clover
item.description: Look what you have found! Lucky you!

item.name: Fire Scroll
item.description: Equippable scroll with a fire spell on it. What kind of effect may this have?

item.name: Grimoire
item.description: A Sage's spellbook. Sure it contains useful information for mages.

item.name: Heart of Isis
item.description: Heart-shaped ruby, used for this magic piece of magic. Looks somewhat legacy.

item.name: Theta Book
item.description: A Wizard's spell book from the old days. What could be written inside?

item.name: Hitchhiker's Towel
item.description: Never, never travel without your towel on you!

item.name: Creased Shirt
item.description: A spare shirt from the crew of La Johanne.

item.name: %Color% V-neck Jumper
item.description: A simple %color% jumper made from a lightweight silk.

item.name: %Color% Artis Tank Top
item.description: A %color% tank top made from cotton cloth.

item.name: Sailor Shirt
item.description: Proof that ye be in the crew, matey!

item.name: Legion's Training Shirt
item.description: Informal shirt worn during intense aerobic exercises.

item.name: Legion's Copper Armor
item.description: This armor provides great protection. It is worn by those with authority.

item.name: Forest Armor
item.description: An Armor made for hunting.

item.name: %Color% Silk Robe
item.description: A %color% light robe out of silk. Does not provide much protection, though.

item.name: %Color% Fine Dress
item.description: A fine %Color% dress for the Lady or the Gentleman of today.

item.name: Warlord Plate
item.description: Strong and decorative armor.

item.name: Legion's Iron Armor
item.description: This armor provides even greater protection. It is worn by those with even more authority.

item.name: Golden Warlord Plate
item.description: Strong and decorative armor, made of pure gold.

item.name: Apprentice Robe
item.description: A Robe for those interested in using magic.

item.name: Assassin Chest Armor
item.description: A hard but flexible plate armor, protects but does not reduce mobility.

item.name: Black Armor
item.description: If you like black, this may be suitable. If you dont, better choose something else.

item.name: Chainmail
item.description: A chainmail armor, originally used by knights. Good for protection, but heavy.

item.name: Evocator Robe
item.description: A robe for advanced mages who are focused on creating life, and taking it.

item.name: %Color% Justifier Chest
item.description: A %color% chest armor, due to its lightweight mainly used by archers.

item.name: Light Platemail
item.description: A plate armor, originally used by strong knights. Good for protection, but very heavy.

item.name: Pelt Jacket
item.description: A warm jacket with pelt. Be aware of PETA when wearing this.

item.name: Snake Plate
item.description: A light plate armor, made of snake leather. Very robust, and not too heavy.

item.name: Sorcerer Robe
item.description: A Robe for experienced sorcerers.

item.name: Terranite Armor
item.description: A piece of chest armor, made from Terranite. Very useful against magic attacks.

item.name: Wizard Robe
item.description: A protective light robe, mostly used by Wizards.

item.name: Lousy Moccasins
item.description: Crudely assembled footwear not for comfort nor fashion.

item.name: %Color% Cotton Boots
item.description: A pair of %color% quality cotton boots.

item.name: Fur Boots
item.description: A pair of warming boots, made with fluffy fur.

item.name: Bandit Boots
item.description: A pair of light, sneaky boots. Good to sneak without being noisy.

item.name: Assassin Boots
item.description: Special, thin boots, used to move silently.

item.name: Bromenal Boots
item.description: Robust boots for experienced fighters.

item.name: Riding Boots
item.description: Heavy boots with a long shaft, used for riding or for a good stand.

item.name: Slippers
item.description: Very light slippers. Normally used indoors, but they also help to have a good connection to the earth, and to the Mana within.

item.name: Warlord Boots
item.description: Only the best swordsmen are capable of fighting with those heavy shoes.

item.name: %Color% Mana Slippers
item.description: Very light %color% slippers, with a robust sole. They also help to have a good connection to the earth, and to the Mana within, so they are quite useful for mages.

item.name: Squirrel Boots
item.description: Shoort boots made of squirrel leather, well-designed for moving in the forest.

item.name: Black Boots
item.description: Heavy, black boots. Normally worn by soldiers. Equipped with a steel cap, for tough operations.

item.name: Leather Boots
item.description: Stylish boots made of leather. Protective, comfortable, lightweight.

item.name: Golden Warlord Boots
item.description: Shiny, golden boots for rich fighters who do not need to focus on fighting - because that may give diry shoes.

item.name: Armbands
item.description: Small armbands made of wood and iron.

item.name: Copper Armbands
item.description: Sturdy, combat-issue armbands.

item.name: Iron Armbands
item.description: Heavy armbands that slow down all but experienced warriors.

item.name: %Color% Cotton Gloves
item.description: A pair of comfy, %color% cotton gloves.

item.name: Leather Gloves
item.description: Gloves made of hardened leather.

item.name: Bandit Gloves
item.description: Gloves made soft leather, perfect for stealing or backstabbing.

item.name: Assassin Gloves
item.description: Thin, but deadly gloves, best to be used when fighting with bare hands.

item.name: Bromenal Gloves
item.description: A Fighter's gloves from material pretty unknown nowadays.

item.name: Short Gloves
item.description: Very thin gloves. They do not protect well, but they are not a big barrier for Mana either.

item.name: %Color% Silk Gloves
item.description: Very thin %color% gloves, made of silk. They do not protect well, but they are no barrier for Mana at all.

item.name: Black Gloves
item.description: Heavy, black gloves for melee fighters. Protective, but not so easy to fight with.

item.name: Fur Gloves
item.description: Leather gloves with comfy fur inside. Never again cold fingers!

item.name: Golden Armbands
item.description: Shiny golden armbands. Not exceptionally useful for fighting, but great to show off with.

item.name: Mana Gloves
item.description: Light gloves, shimmering in a light blue. You can feel the manaic aura even when just looking at them.

item.name: Creased Shorts
item.description: Spare shorts from the crew of La Johanne.

item.name: Brown Trousers
item.description: Classic trousers ornated with some fluffy fur.

item.name: Jeans Chaps
item.description: Jeans with snake skin chaps.

item.name: %Color% Silk Pants
item.description: A very light fancy pair of %Color% silk trousers.

item.name: %Color% Cotton Skirt
item.description: A %color% skirt made of simple cotton.

item.name: Leather Trousers
item.description: A common pair of pants made from leather.

item.name: Bandit Trousers
item.description: Not really odoriferous trousers, formerly worn by some stinky bandit.

item.name: Assassin Pants
item.description: Dark colored pants, for fighters to be invisible in darkness.

item.name: Chainmail Skirt
item.description: A heavy skirt made of chainmail material. Quite protective.

item.name: Pirate Shorts
item.description: Tattered, washed-out shorts. Not really protective, but good for spending a life on a ship.

item.name: Terranite Pants
item.description: A pair of pretty stiff pants, made from Terranite. Very useful against magic attacks.

item.name: Barrel
item.description: It smells as if somebody used to live inside this barrel...

item.name: Leather Shield
item.description: Small and round leather shield with iron reinforcement.

item.name: Wooden Shield
item.description: A shield made of wood.

item.name: Steel Shield
item.description: A shield made of steel.

item.name: Ancient Shield
item.description: A shield made wood and leather. It has drawings on it, looks like from a forgotten tribe.

item.name: Blade Shield
item.description: An iron shield, the edges are designed with blades. Pretty dangerous.

item.name: Dragon Shield
item.description: A steel shield, hardened in the blood of dragons. The ultimate defense item.

item.name: Buckler
item.description: A small, round wooden shield. Small, but still somewhat protective.

item.name: Bandana
item.description: A striped bandana worn by some sailors.

item.name: Pumpkin Hat
item.description: A carved pumpkin. Its face might scare your enemy off!

item.name: Fancy Hat
item.description: Worn when living away from cities.

item.name: Brimmed Hat
item.description: Unequip when indoors, please.

item.name: Brimmed Feather Hat
item.description: Distinguishes someone who is traveling.

item.name: Brimmed Flower Hat
item.description: To wear at festivals and certain events.

item.name: infantry Helmet
item.description: A helmet for soldiers and guards.

item.name: Candle Helmet
item.description: Worn by spelunkers.

item.name: Warlord Helmet
item.description: Worn by great warriors!

item.name: Axe Hat
item.description: A really cool joke, but not very helpful.

item.name: Pinkie Hat
item.description: With this, you'll fit right in with those strange pinkies.

item.name: Top Hat
item.description: For the gentry of The Mana World, and other worlds.

item.name: Bowler Hat
item.description: A hat for those with a bit of class.

item.name: Fairy Hat
item.description: Worn by people that are living and hunting in the woods.

item.name: Noh Mask
item.description: A traditional chinese Noh Mask.

item.name: Rosehat
item.description: A hat made out of a rose. You cant be sure whether this is the proper usage for a rose.

item.name: Bandit Hood
item.description: A woolen hood, very useful to hide your face from too curious constables, for example.

item.name: Brown Bowler Hat
item.description: A hat for those with a bit of class.

item.name: Cat Ears
item.description: Meow! A pair of plush cat ears. Meow!

item.name: Santa Hat
item.description: The beard is missing, but at least you could pretend to be him. Or his fan.

item.name: Moonshroom Hat
item.description: Do you feel this magic aura?

item.name: Santa Beard Hat
item.description: Hohoho! Gifts for the nice! Coal for the naughty!

item.name: Cashier Shade
item.description: Do you have something to hide? Or are you just sensitive against the sun?

item.name: Beanie Copter
item.description: A funny beanie cap with a spinning propeller.

item.name: Bull Helmet
item.description: Heavy helmet for the merciless fighter.

item.name: Bunny Ears
item.description: So cute! You look like a bunny!

item.name: Desert Hat
item.description: If you stroll under the burning suns, be sure to protect your head.

item.name: Miner Hat
item.description: You would like to wear a protective helmet, which can enlight the area in front of you, if you are in deep caves.

item.name: Silk Headband
item.description: Wow! With this you look like Rambo!

item.name: Headband
item.description: Hmm, you look like a cheap version of Rambo.

item.name: Terranite Helmet
item.description: Even though this is a bit stinky, the material properly protects your head, and its internals.

item.name: Trapper Hat
item.description: When you are exploring the cold areas of the planet, be sure to keep your ears warm.

item.name: Wizard Hat
item.description: You call yourself a mage? Be sure to equip proper headwear!

item.name: Captain's Hat
item.description: Harr harr! Aboard, you stinky landlubbers! Hoist the sails!

item.name: Ranger Hat
item.description: A leather hat traditionally worn by Rangers. Symbol of the Pinkie-Hater cult.

item.name: Shemagh
item.description: An improved scarf used by mercenaries in tough environments.

item.name: Bandit Shawl
item.description: A shawl, more for hiding you face than for keeping you warm.

item.name: Eye Patch
item.description: Arr! What's a pirate with two eyes? A not-pirate! Ar Arr!

item.name: Burglar Mask
item.description: Wear it, and noone will recognize you! Okay, the police will.

item.name: Heart Glasses
item.description: Heart-shaped glasses. Its so 80's style.

item.name: Mustache
item.description: You are not serious, are you?

item.name: Red Nose
item.description: A red nose, made of plastic. Wearing this you look like Rudolph.

item.name: Sunglasses
item.description: The sun shines too bright? No problem, just wear those sunglasses.

item.name: Beard
item.description: This definitely makes you look.. erm.. wiser.

item.name: Full Beard
item.description: If only you had a red bobble hat now, you would look like Santa!

item.name: Knife
item.description: A simple, but sharp knife.

item.name: Piou Slayer
item.description: A short sword for amateurs. Well, more a dagger than a sword, that is.

item.name: Training Gladius
item.description: A short sword made for close combat.

item.name: Wooden Sword
item.description: For sword training. Do not show-off with it.

item.name: Artis Backsword
item.description: An engraved backsword with the symbole of Artis on its brass hilt.

item.name: Training Wand
item.description: A simple wand for your first steps in handling magic.

item.name: Mana Torch
item.description: A simple wand imbued with a fire spell, it can provide lighting and will never run out on you!

item.name: Scythe
item.description: A farmer's scythe, not new but still deadly.

item.name: Dagger
item.description: Use to stab.

item.name: Setzer
item.description: A knife named after a famous gambler.

item.name: Pickaxe
item.description: A common pickaxe, not so good for battle but suitable for mining.

item.name: Torch
item.description: A burning Torch. Handle with care.

item.name: Axe
item.description: A rusty axe, made for chopping trees rather than battle.

item.name: Wooden Staff
item.description: A long wooden staff, simple but effective for smashing. Or for magic. Or for both.

item.name: Halberd
item.description: A halberd, commonly used by knights. Sharp and dangerous.

item.name: Sharp Knife
item.description: A sharp knife, commonly used by chefs.

item.name: Bone Knife
item.description: A knife made from bones. Quite effective.

item.name: Chopper
item.description: Chop, chop, parsley. Chop, chop, head.

item.name: Cleaver
item.description: Good for chopping, but even better for fighting, smashing, killing.

item.name: Rock Knife
item.description: Machete-like weapon, made of hard stone. Not a weapon for pacifists.

item.name: Bronze Gladius
item.description: A typical one-handed sword, made out of bronze.

item.name: Short Sword
item.description: Iron short sword. The standard weapon for experienced knights.

item.name: Long Sword
item.description: If you are strong enough, this long sword gives you quite more destructive power.

item.name: Spear
item.description: If you train hard, you can defeat whole armies with that, keeping your enemies on distance.

item.name: Katana
item.description: A typical japanese two-hand sword. Incredibly sharp, incredibly dangerous.

item.name: Warped Staff
item.description: A staff made out of a strange branch, warped within itself.

item.name: Wizard Staff (%Color%)
item.description: A professional staff with a %color%. In the hands of an experienced wizard, it is able to move the mountains.

item.name: Staff of Life
item.description: A enchanted piece of wood. Very suitable for mages.

item.name: Apprentice Wand (%Color%)
item.description: A simple %color% wand for you once may become an awesome magician.

item.name: Piou egg
item.description: Piou egg. Not for omelettes!

item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Crimson Silk Dye
item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Diamond
item.description: A diamond, polished and shining.

item.name: Ruby
item.description: A polished ruby, blinking in bright red color.

item.name: Emerald
item.description: A polished Emerald, beautiful and green.

item.name: Sapphire
item.description: A polished sapphire, blinking in dark blue.

item.name: Topaz
item.description: A Topaz, polished and beautiful.

item.name: Amethyst
item.description: A polished Amethyst. Some say it has the power to heal.

item.name: Crude Diamond
item.description: A crude diamond, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Crude Ruby
item.description: A crude ruby, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Crude Emerald
item.description: A crude emerald, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Crude Sapphire
item.description: A crude sapphire, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Crude Topaz
item.description: A crude topaz, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Crude Amethyst
item.description: A crude amethyst, fresh from the mines.

item.name: Tomato Silk Dye
item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Goldenrod Silk Dye
item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Sunflower Silk Dye
item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Orchid Silk Dye
item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Pinkie Pink Silk Dye
item.description: Color dye that can be used on silk clothing.

item.name: Uruz Runestone
item.description: A small, round stone with a symbol on it. Represents strength.

item.name: Raido Runestone
item.description: A small, round stone with a symbol on it. Represents agility.

item.name: Thurisaz Runestone
item.description: A small, round stone with a symbol on it. Represents vitality.

item.name: Kaunaz Runestone
item.description: A small, round stone with a symbol on it. Represents intelligence.

item.name: Dagaz Runestone
item.description: A small, round stone with a symbol on it. Represents dexterity.

item.name: Peorth Runestone
item.description: A small, round stone with a symbol on it. Represents luck.

item.name: Training Bow
item.description: For bow training. Does not seem much reliable.

item.name: Short Bow
item.description: The shortest of them all, and almost a knife, but the only which hits at point-blank range.

item.name: Forest Bow
item.description: A big bow, to hunt monsters in the forest.

item.name: Desert Bow
item.description: Fragile long bow, for open ranges. Needs some training.

item.name: Champion Bow
item.description: A bow for champions. Ask Jesusalva.

item.name: Banshee Bow
item.description: A bow, holding the evil powers of a legacy world.

item.name: Slingshot
item.description: Some say its a toy, I say its a weapon. Ask David.

item.name: Training Arrow
item.description: For bow training. Does not seem much reliable.

item.name: Iron Arrow
item.description: Solid arrow for bowmen. Careful, its sharp!

item.name: Bone Arrow
item.description: Scary arrow, carved from a pice of bone. Very lightweight.

item.name: Poisoned Arrow
item.description: Sharp arrow, with a poisoned tip. Don't touch it!

item.name: Terranit Arrow
item.description: Professioal arrow, made from terranite. Sharp, stiff, deadly.

item.name: Stone Projectile
item.description: Ammo for your slingshot. Can be very powerful, when its in David's hands. What about yours?

item.name: Adventurer's Soul
item.description: Seems like someone fell prey to PK'ing.

item.name: Black Pearl
item.description: A shiny, black pearl. It must be old!

item.name: Bloodstone
item.description: A dark read, shimmering stone. It looks scary.

item.name: Bottle of Sand
item.description: A bottle filled with sand. Where this sand may originate?

item.name: Brainstem
item.description: If only someone knew what kind of being exactly that comes from.

item.name: Closed Christmas Box
item.description: Surprise surprise, what might be inside?

item.name: Open Christmas Box
item.description: Surprise surprise, what might have been inside?

item.name: Red Christmas Ornament
item.description: An ornament from Santa's tree.

item.name: Yellow Christmas Ornament
item.description: An ornament from Santa's tree.

item.name: Green Christmas Ornament
item.description: An ornament from Santa's tree.

item.name: Aqua Christmas Ornament
item.description: An ornament from Santa's tree.

item.name: Blue Christmas Ornament
item.description: An ornament from Santa's tree.

item.name: Purple Christmas Ornament
item.description: An ornament from Santa's tree.

item.name: Doll
item.description: You see right. This doll is not broken.

item.name: Easter Basket
item.description: A nice basket. Someone may hide it during easter and fill it with chocolate.

item.name: Easteregg
item.description: A chocolate egg, wrapped in silver paper.

item.name: Plastic Fangs
item.description: You will look like a vampire with these!

item.name: Flawed Lens
item.description: A failed attempt at making a lens with powerful properties. Perhaps, one day, you will be able to salvage the remains from this effort.

item.name: Dark Petal
item.description: A single, dark, petal, oddly heavy. The edges of the petal are unusually hard, and have a slightly reflective shine to them. But looking into the gleam, you can only see fire...

item.name: Flight Talisman
item.description: A talisman created using ancient magic to keep you safe during flights.

item.name: Jellybeans
item.description: Colorful and tasty Jelly Beans.

item.name: Leatherball
item.description: A heavy ball made out of leather, used for playing soccer in the old days.

item.name: Booberry Blue Lollipop
item.description: A lollipop. Mmm.

item.name: Ghastly Green Lollipop
item.description: A lollipop. Tasty.

item.name: Blood Red Lollipop
item.description: A lollipop. Yum.

item.name: Plush Mouboo
item.description: A mouboo made of plush. How cute!

item.name: Red Stocking
item.description: Eww, it's smelly!

item.name: Stick Reinboo
item.description: A stick reinboo. This is fun!

item.name: Rubber Bat
item.description: Squeaks when you squeeze it.

item.name: Santa Cookie
item.description: A cookie, given to you by the one and only Santa Claus!

item.name: Santa Globe
item.description: A snow globe featuring Santa.

item.name: Scissors
item.description: A pair of awkward and unwieldy scissors.

item.name: Silver Bell
item.description: A tiny bell made of silver.

item.name: Snowman Globe
item.description: A snow globe featuring Snowman.

item.name: Strange Coin
item.description: A cheap looking yellow plastic coin. Seems to be rather useless.

item.name: Tongue
item.description: A tongue. Ewww.

item.name: Dotted Wrapping Paper
item.description: Nice dotted wrapping paper, to be used for wrapping presents.

item.name: Dotted Wrapping Paper
item.description: Nice striped wrapping paper, to be used for wrapping presents.
